item.description:
Come join us for a night in Hungary! We will explore the world of furmint and taste some Hungarian foods.

This meetup is a combination of the AWS Hudson, Metrowest White Wine, and AWS Wine Group II groups and is being cross-posted on all 3 groups.  Please sign up only once at your favorite group so we can keep an accurate head-count.

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Journey to Tokaji
